BlueVM is offering our 512 MB KVM VPS for just $5.00 per month for a limited time. Features include:

512 MB of RAM
2 CPU's (@2.5 Ghz+ Each)
1 IP Address
10 GB of Storage
1 TB of Bandwidth (@ 1 Gbps)

Order Monthly: https://www.bluevm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=75

Order Quarterly (or higher) and Get Double Storage (20 GB): https://www.bluevm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=76

Location: California
Updated Test IP: 184.170.244.46
Remaining Stock: 10

We will release more stock if this sells out within 24 hours, if not it'll run until full. Please be sure when ordering that you select the correct link for your purchase type (monthly or quarterly) otherwise your purchase won't apply correctly.
